title: Wyoming
prompt: A wide landscape photograph of a two-lane Wyoming highway stretching toward distant mountains under soft morning light, with sagebrush-covered high desert flanking both sides, a single rural mailbox visible at a ranch gate in the middle distance, and the vastness of empty terrain conveying both isolation and stark beautyâ€”shot from a low angle emphasizing the horizon line and the weight of distance, in muted earth tones of tan, grey, and soft green.
